data.name: Stuff Enuff
data.detailed_description: Stuff Enuff is a party game that is designed with competitive players in mind. Gone is the randomness of other party games, we are pushing to have the best players win, instead of a random number generator. Lead the charge as one of eight Stuffed Animals and compete against your friends. The best players will win, and can trash talk to their friends. Stuff Enuff is designed for 4-player play in mind, there are Free-For-All, 3v1, and Tag Team mini games. With a variety of minigames and a variety of gameboards there will be a lot of fun, and competition. Play against your friends, family, enemies and show YOU ARE STUFF ENUFF!
data.about_the_game: Stuff Enuff is a party game that is designed with competitive players in mind. data.short_description: A competitive party game designed to ruin friendships!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 (4 * 3200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4096 VRAM) or equivalent
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
